definitionList.name: RESET
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU-CP
and the gNB-CU-UP and is used to request that the E1 interface, or parts of the
E1 interface, to be reset.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU-CP → gNB-CU-UP and gNB-CU-UP → gNB-CU-CP

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of UE-associated logical
  E1-connections allowed to reset in one message. Value is 65536.

definitionList.name: RESET ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU-CP
and the gNB-CU-UP as a response to a RESET message.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU-UP → gNB-CU-CP and gNB-CU-CP → gNB-CU-UP.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of UE-associated logical E1-connections allowed to reset in one message.
  Value is 65536.

definitionList.name: ERROR INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU-CP
and the gNB-CU-UP and is used to indicate that some error has been detected in
the node.
definitionList.direction: Direction: gNB-CU-CP → gNB-CU-UP and gNB-CU-UP → gNB-CU-CP

definitionList.name: E1 RELEASE RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by both the gNB-CU-CP
and the gNB-CU-UP as a response to an E1 RELEASE REQUEST message.

definitionList.name: GNB-CU-UP STATUS INDICATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU-UP to
indicate to the gNB-CU-CP its status of overload.

definitionList.name: RESOURCE STATUS REQUEST
descriptionList:
This message is sent by an gNB-CU-CP to gNB-CU-UP
to initiate the requested measurement according to the parameters given in the
message.

elementList.name: gNB-CU-CP Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU-CP

elementList.name: gNB-CU-UP Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU-UP

elementList.name: Registration Request
elementList.description: Type of request for which the resource status is required.

elementList.name: Report Characteristics
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap indicates measurement object the gNB-CU-UP is requested to report. First Bit = TNL Available Capacity Ind Periodic, Second Bit = HW Capacity Ind Periodic. Other bits shall be ignored by the gNB-CU-UP.

elementList.name: Reporting Periodicity
elementList.description: Periodicity that can be used for reporting. Also used as the averaging window length for all measurement object if supported.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the Registration
  Request IE is set to the value  stop

This IE shall be present if the Registration
  Request IE is set to the value "start".

definitionList.name: RESOURCE STATUS RESPONSE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU-UP to
indicate that the requested measurement, for all the measurement objects
included in the measurement is successfully initiated.

elementList.name: gNB-CU-CP Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU-CP

elementList.name: gNB-CU-UP Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU-UP

definitionList.name: RESOURCE STATUS FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU-UP to
indicate that for any of the requested measurement objects the measurement cannot
be initiated.

elementList.name: gNB-CU-CP Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU-CP

elementList.name: gNB-CU-UP Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU-UP

elementList.name: Cause
elementList.description: Ignored by the receiver when the Complete Failure Cause Information IE is included

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the Registration
  Request IE is set to the value  stop

definitionList.name: RESOURCE STATUS UPDATE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by gNB-CU-UP to gNB-CU-CP
to report the results of the requested measurements.

elementList.name: gNB-CU-CP Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU-CP

elementList.name: gNB-CU-UP Measurement ID
elementList.description: Allocated by gNB-CU-UP

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of Supported PLMN Ids. Value is 12.

Maximum no. of signalled slice support items.
  Value is 1024.

elementList.name: DRBs Subject to Counter Check List
DRBs Subject to Counter Check Item
PDCP UL Count

This message is sent by the source gNB-CU-UP
to the source gNB-CU-CP to transfer the COUNT value(s) related to early
forwarded downlink PDCP SDUs during Conditional Handover or conditional PSCell change.

elementList.name: DRBs Subject To Early Forwarding List
DRBs Subject To Early Forwarding Item
DL COUNT Value
elementList.description: PDCP-SN and Hyper frame number of the last DL SDU successfully delivered in sequence to the UE, if RLC-AM, and successfully transmitted, if RLC-UM.

definitionList.name: GNB-CU-CP MEASUREMENT RESULTS INFORMATION
descriptionList:
This message is sent to the gNB-CU-UP to
provide the measurement result received by the gNB-CU-CP.

elementList.name: UL D1 Result
elementList.description: The unit is: 0.1ms

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of DRB allowed towards one UE, the
  maximum value is 64.

definitionList.name: TRACE START
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU-CP to
initiate a trace session for a UE.

definitionList.name: DEACTIVATE TRACE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU-CP to
deactivate a trace session.

elementList.name: Trace ID
elementList.description: As per Trace ID in Trace Activation IE

definitionList.name: CELL TRAFFIC TRACE
descriptionList: This message is sent by the gNB-CU-UP to initiate a trace session for a UE.

elementList.name: Trace ID
elementList.description: The Trace ID IE is composed of the following: Trace Reference defined in TS 32.422 [24] (leftmost 6 octets, with PLMN information coded as in 9.2.3.8), and Trace Recording Session Reference defined in TS 32.422 [24] (last 2 octets).

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity IP Address
elementList.description: For File based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [24]. Should be ignored if URI is present.

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity URI
elementList.description: For Streaming based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [24] Replaces Trace Collection Entity IP Address if present.

definitionList.name: IAB UP TNL ADDRESS UPDATE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU-CP to
request the gNB-CU-UP to update the TNL address(es) of the DL F1-U GTP tunnel
information.

elementList.name: DL UP TNL Address To Update List
DL UP TNL Address To Update Item IEs
Old TNL Address
elementList.description: The old Transport Layer Address of IAB-DU for DL F1-U GTP tunnel.

elementList.name: New TNL Address
elementList.description: The new Transport Layer Address of IAB-DU for DL F1-U GTP tunnel.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of TNL addresses to be updated in
  one E1AP procedure. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: IAB UP TNL ADDRESS UPDATE ACKNOWLEDGE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU-UP to
the gNB-CU-CP to acknowledge the update of TNL address in DL F1-U GTP tunnel
information, or provide the updated TNL address(es) of the UL F1-U GTP tunnel
information.

elementList.name: UL UP TNL Address to Update List
UL UP TNL Address Updated Item IEs
Old TNL Address
elementList.description: The old Transport Layer Address of CU-UP for UL F1-U GTP tunnel.

elementList.name: New TNL Address
elementList.description: The new Transport Layer Address of CU-UP for UL F1-U GTP tunnel.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of TNL addresses updated in one
  E1AP procedure. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: IAB UP TNL ADDRESS UPDATE FAILURE
descriptionList:
This message is sent by the gNB-CU-UP to
indicate IAB UP TNL address Update failure.

definitionList.name: Message Type
descriptionList:
The Message Type IE uniquely
identifies the message being sent. It is mandatory for all messages.

elementList.name: Type of Message
elementList.type: CHOICE (Initiating Message, Successful Outcome, Unsuccessful Outcome, )

definitionList.name: Cause
descriptionList:
The purpose of the Cause IE is to
indicate the reason for a particular event for the E1AP protocol.

elementList.name: Radio Network Layer Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Unspecified, Unknown or already allocated gNB-CU-CP UE E1AP ID, Unknown or already allocated gNB-CU-UP UE E1AP ID, Unknown or inconsistent pair of UE E1AP ID, Interaction with other procedure, PDCP Count Wrap Around, Not supported QCI value, Not supported 5QI value, Encryption algorithms not supported, Integrity protection algorithms not supported, UP integrity protection not possible, UP confidentiality protection not possible, Multiple PDU Session ID Instances, Unknown PDU Session ID, Multiple QoS Flow ID Instances, Unknown QoS Flow ID, Multiple DRB ID Instances, Unknown DRB ID, Invalid QoS combination, Procedure cancelled, Normal release, No radio resources available, Action desirable for radio reasons, Resources not available for the slice, PDCP configuration not supported, , UE DL maximum integrity protected data rate reason, UP integrity protection failure, Release due to Pre-Emption, RSN not available for the UP, NPN not supported, Report Characteristics Empty, Existing Measurement ID, Measurement Temporarily not Available Measurement not Supported For The Object)

elementList.name: Transport Layer Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Unspecified, Transport Resource Unavailable, , Unknown TNL address for IAB)

elementList.name: Protocol Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Transfer Syntax Error, Abstract Syntax Error (Reject), Abstract Syntax Error (Ignore and Notify), Message not Compatible with Receiver State, Semantic Error, Abstract Syntax Error (Falsely Constructed Message), Unspecified, )

elementList.name: Miscellaneous Cause
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Control Processing Overload, Not enough User Plane Processing Resources, Hardware Failure, O&M Intervention, Unspecified, )

definitionList.name: Criticality Diagnostics
descriptionList:
The Criticality Diagnostics IE is
sent by the gNB-CU-UP or the gNB-CU-CP when parts of a received message have
not been comprehended or were missing, or if the message contained logical
errors. When applicable, it contains information about which IEs were not
comprehended or were missing. The conditions for inclusion of the Transaction
ID IE are described in clause 10.

For further details on how to use the Criticality
Diagnostics IE, (see clause 10).

elementList.name: Procedure Code
elementList.description: Procedure Code is to be used if Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure, and not within the response message of the same procedure that caused the error.

elementList.name: Triggering Message
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(initiating message, successful outcome, unsuccessful outcome)
elementList.description: The Triggering Message is used only if the Criticality Diagnostics is part of Error Indication procedure.

elementList.name: Procedure Criticality
elementList.description: This Procedure Criticality is used for reporting the Criticality of the Triggering message (Procedure).

elementList.name: IE Criticality
elementList.description: The IE Criticality is used for reporting the criticality of the triggering IE. The value 'ignore' is not applicable.

elementList.name: IE ID
elementList.description: The IE ID of the not understood or missing IE.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of IE errors allowed to be reported with a single message. The value for
  maxnoofErrors is 256.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU-CP UE E1AP ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-CU-CP UE E1AP ID uniquely
identifies the UE association over the E1 interface within the gNB-CU-CP.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU-UP UE E1AP ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-CU-UP UE E1AP ID uniquely
identifies the UE association over the E1 interface within the gNB-CU-UP.

definitionList.name: Time To wait
descriptionList:
This IE
defines the minimum allowed waiting times.

definitionList.name: PLMN Identity
descriptionList:
This information element indicates the PLMN
Identity.

elementList.name: PLMN Identity
elementList.description: - digits 0 to 9, encoded 0000 to 1001, - 1111 used as filler digit, two digits per octet, - bits 4 to 1 of octet n encoding digit 2n-1 - bits 8 to 5 of octet n encoding digit 2n -The PLMN identity consists of 3 digits from MCC followed by either -a filler digit plus 2 digits from MNC (in case of 2 digit MNC) or -3 digits from MNC (in case of a 3 digit MNC).

definitionList.name: Slice Support List
descriptionList: This IE indicates the list of supported slices.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of signalled slice support items. Value is 1024.

definitionList.name: S-NSSAI
descriptionList: This IE indicates the S-NSSAI as defined in TS 23.003 [23].

definitionList.name: Security Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides the information for
configuring UP ciphering and/or integrity protection.

definitionList.name: Cell Group Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides information about the cell
group(s) (i.e., radio leg(s)) that are part of the DRB.

elementList.name: Cell Group ID
elementList.description: Cell group ID as defined in TS 38.331 [10] (0=MCG, 1=SCG). In this version of the specification, values 2 and 3 are not used. For E-UTRA Cell Groups, the same encoding is used as for NR Cell Groups. NOTE: There is no corresponding IE defined in TS 36.331 [21].

elementList.name: UL Configuration
elementList.description: Indicates whether the Cell Group is used for UL traffic.

elementList.name: RAT Type
elementList.description: Indicates the RAT.

elementList.name: Number of tunnels
elementList.description: Indicates the tunnel number of PDCP duplication for this cell group.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of cell groups for a DRB. Value is 4.

definitionList.name: QoS Flow List
descriptionList:
This IE includes a list of QoS Flows that
are identified by the QoS Flow Identifier.

elementList.name: QoS Flow Mapping Indication
elementList.description: Indicates that only the uplink or downlink QoS flow is mapped to the DRB

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of QoS flows in a PDU Session.
  Value is 64.

definitionList.name: UP Parameters
descriptionList:
This IE provides information related to a
DRB configured in the gNB-CU-UP.

elementList.name: Cell Group ID
elementList.description: Cell group ID as defined in TS 38.331 [10] (0=MCG, 1=SCG). In this version of the specification, values 2 and 3 are not used.

elementList.name: QoS Mapping Information
elementList.description: This IE is only used for IAB.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of UP parameters (e.g., GTP tunnels) for a DRB. Value is 8

definitionList.name: NR CGI
descriptionList:
The NR Cell Global Identifier (NR CGI) is
used to globally identify a cell.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU-UP ID
descriptionList:
The gNB-CU-UP ID uniquely identifies the
gNB-CU-UP at least within a
gNB-CU-CP.

definitionList.name: DRB ID
descriptionList: This IE uniquely identifies a DRB for a UE.

elementList.name: DRB ID
elementList.description: Corresponds to the DRB-Identity defined in TS 38.331 [10].

definitionList.name: E-UTRAN QoS
descriptionList:
This IE defines the QoS to be applied to a
DRB for EN-DC case.

elementList.name: QCI
elementList.description: QoS Class Identifier defined in TS 23.401 [11]. Logical range and coding specified in TS 23.203 [12].

elementList.name: E-UTRAN Allocation and Retention Priority
elementList.description: E-UTRAN Allocation and Retention Priority

elementList.name: GBR QoS Information
elementList.description: This IE applies to GBR bearers only and is ignored otherwise.

definitionList.name: E-UTRAN Allocation and Retention Priority
descriptionList:
This IE specifies the relative importance
compared to other E-RABs for allocation and retention of the E-UTRAN Radio
Access Bearer.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE should be understood as "priority of allocation and retention" (see TS 23.401 [11]). Usage: Value 15 means "no priority". Values between 1 and 14 are ordered in decreasing order of priority, i.e. 1 is the highest and 14 the lowest. Value 0 shall be treated as a logical error if received.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Capability
elementList.type: ENUMERATED(shall not trigger pre-emption, may trigger pre-emption)
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the pre-emption capability of the request on other E-RABs Usage: The E-RAB shall not pre-empt other E-RABs or, the E-RAB may pre-empt other E-RABs The Pre-emption Capability indicator applies to the allocation of resources for an E-RAB and as such it provides the trigger to the pre-emption procedures/processes of the eNB.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Vulnerability
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the vulnerability of the E-RAB to pre-emption of other E-RABs. Usage: The E-RAB shall not be pre-empted by other E-RABs or the E-RAB may be pre-empted by other RABs. Pre-emption Vulnerability indicator applies for the entire duration of the E-RAB, unless modified, and as such indicates whether the E-RAB is a target of the pre-emption procedures/processes of the eNB.

definitionList.name: GBR QoS Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the maximum and
guaranteed bit rates of a GBR E-RAB for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: E-RAB Maximum Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in DL (i.e. from EPC to E-UTRAN) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [11].

elementList.name: E-RAB Maximum Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in UL (i.e. from E-UTRAN to EPC) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [11].

elementList.name: E-RAB Guaranteed Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided that there is data to deliver) in DL (i.e. from EPC to E-UTRAN) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [11].

elementList.name: E-RAB Guaranteed Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided that there is data to deliver) in UL (i.e. from E-UTRAN to EPC) for the bearer. Details in TS 23.401 [11].

definitionList.name: Bit Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the number of bits
delivered by NG-RAN in UL or to NG-RAN in DL within a period of time, divided by
the duration of the period. It is used, for example, to indicate the maximum or
guaranteed bit rate for a GBR QoS flow, or an aggregated maximum bit rate.

elementList.name: Bit Rate
elementList.description: The unit is: bit/s

definitionList.name: PDU Session ID
descriptionList:
This IE identifies a PDU Session for a UE.
The definition and use of the PDU Session ID is specified in TS 23.501 [20].

definitionList.name: PDU Session Type
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the PDU Session Type as
specified in TS 23.501 [20].

definitionList.name: Security Indication
descriptionList:
This IE contains the user plane integrity protection
indication and confidentiality protection indication which indicates the
requirements on UP integrity protection and ciphering for corresponding PDU Session
Resources, respectively.

elementList.name: Integrity Protection Indication
elementList.description: Indicates whether UP integrity protection shall apply, should apply or shall not apply for the concerned PDU Session Resource.

elementList.name: Confidentiality Protection Indication
elementList.description: Indicates whether UP ciphering shall apply, should apply or shall not apply for the concerned PDU Session Resource.

elementList.name: Maximum Integrity Protected Data Rate
elementList.description: If present, this is the value received from the CN for the overall UE capability. This IE is ignored when enforcing the maximum IP data rate.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE
  shall be present if the Integrity Protection Indication IE within the Security
  Indication IE is set to  required  or  preferred .

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Identifier
descriptionList:
This IE
identifies a QoS Flow within a PDU Session. Definition and use of the QoS Flow
Identifier is specified in TS 23.501 [20].

definitionList.name: QoS Flow QoS Parameters List
descriptionList:
This IE contains a list of QoS Flows including
the QoS Flow parameters.

elementList.name: QoS Flow Mapping Indication
elementList.description: Indicates that only the uplink or downlink QoS flow is mapped to the DRB

elementList.name: Redundant QoS Flow Indicator
elementList.description: This IE indicates that this QoS flow is requested for the redundant transmission.

elementList.name: TSC Traffic Characteristics
elementList.description: Traffic pattern information associated with the QFI. Details in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: MCG Offered GBR QoS Flow Information
elementList.description: This IE contains M-Node offered GBR QoS Flow Information.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of QoS flows in a PDU Session.
  Value is 64.

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Level QoS Parameters
descriptionList:
This IE defines the QoS parameters to be
applied to a QoS Flow.

elementList.name: GBR QoS Flow Information
elementList.description: This IE shall be present for GBR QoS Flows and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: Reflective QoS Attribute
elementList.description: Details in TS 23.501 [20]. This IE applies to Non-GBR flows only and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: Additional QoS Flow Information
elementList.description: This IE indicates that traffic for this QoS flow is likely to appear more often than traffic for other flows established for the PDU Session.

elementList.name: RDI
elementList.description: Indicates whether Reflective QoS flow to DRB mapping should be applied.

elementList.name: QoS Monitoring Request
elementList.description: Indicates to measure UL, or DL, or both UL/DL delays for the associated QoS flow.

definitionList.name: Non Dynamic 5QI Descriptor
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics
for a standardized or pre-configured 5QI for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the standardized or pre-configured 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [20]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: This IE applies to GBR QoS Flows only. For details see TS 23.501 [20]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [20]. When included overrides standardized or pre-configured value.

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Downlink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [9]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Uplink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [9]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

definitionList.name: Dynamic 5QI Descriptor
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the QoS Characteristics
for a Non-standardised or not pre-configured 5QI for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [20]. This IE is ignored if the Extended Packet Delay Budget IE is present.

elementList.name: Packet Error Rate
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: 5QI
elementList.description: This IE contains the dynamically assigned 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Delay Critical
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: For details see TS 23.501 [20]. This IE shall be included if the Delay Critical IE is set to delay critical and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [9]

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Downlink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [9]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

elementList.name: CN Packet Delay Budget Uplink
elementList.description: Core Network Packet Delay Budget is specified in TS 23.501 [9]. This IE may be present in case of GBR QoS flows and is ignored otherwise.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be
  present if the GBR QoS Flow Information IE is present in the QoS
  Flow Level QoS Parameters IE.

definitionList.name: NG-RAN Allocation and Retention Priority
descriptionList:
This IE specifies the relative importance
of a QoS flow compared to other QoS flows for allocation and retention of
NG-RAN resources.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE defines the relative importance of a resource request (see TS 23.501 [20]). Usage: Values are ordered in decreasing order of priority, i.e., with 1 as the highest priority and 15 as the lowest priority. Further usage is defined in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Pre-emption Capability
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (shall not trigger pre-emption, may trigger pre-emption)
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the pre-emption capability of the request on other QoS flows. Usage: The QoS flow shall not pre-empt other QoS flows or, the QoS flow may pre-empt other QoS flows. Specified in TS 23.501 [20] NOTE: The Pre-emption Capability indicator applies to the allocation of resources for a QoS flow and as such it provides the trigger to the pre-emption procedures/processes of the NG-RAN node.

elementList.name: Pre-emption Vulnerability
elementList.description: Desc.: This IE indicates the vulnerability of the QoS flow to pre-emption of other QoS flows. Usage: The QoS flow shall not be pre-empted by other QoS flows or the QoS flow may be pre-empted by other QoS flows. Specified in TS 23.501 [20] NOTE: The Pre-emption Vulnerability indicator applies for the entire duration of the QoS flow, unless modified and as such indicates whether the QoS flow is a target of the pre-emption procedures/processes of the NG-RAN node.

definitionList.name: GBR QoS Flow Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates QoS parameters for a GBR
QoS flow for downlink and uplink.

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in DL. Details in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate in UL. Details in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided there is data to deliver) in DL. Details in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate (provided there is data to deliver). Details in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate Downlink
elementList.description: Indicates the maximum rate for lost packets that can be tolerated in the downlink direction. Details in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Maximum Packet Loss Rate Uplink
elementList.description: Indicates the maximum rate for lost packets that can be tolerated in the uplink direction. Details in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set List
elementList.description: Indicates alternative sets of QoS Parameters for the QoS flow.

definitionList.name: Security Algorithm
descriptionList:
This IE defines the type of ciphering
algorithm and/or integrity protection used for the DRBs.

elementList.name: Ciphering Algorithm
elementList.description: As defined in TS 33.501 [13].

elementList.name: Integrity Protection Algorithm
elementList.description: As defined in TS 33.501 [13] for NG-RAN.

definitionList.name: User Plane Security Keys
descriptionList:
This IE contains the ciphering and/or
integrity protection keys generated by the gNB-CU-CP.

elementList.name: Encryption Key
elementList.description: As defined in TS 33.501 [13].

elementList.name: Integrity Protection Key
elementList.description: As defined in TS 33.501 [13] for NG-RAN.

definitionList.name: UL Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE includes the UL configuration for
the DRB and the corresponding Cell Groups.

elementList.name: UL Configuration
elementList.description: Indicates the UL configuration for a Cell Group that is part of a DRB. no data means that the Cell Group is not used for UL data. shared means that the Cell Group is used for UL data together with at least another Cell Group. only means that only this Cellg Group is used for UL data.

definitionList.name: gNB-CU-UP Cell Group Related Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE provides information related to a
cell group that the gNB-CU-UP is allowed to change.

elementList.name: Cell Group ID
elementList.description: Cell group ID as defined in TS 38.331 [10] (0=MCG, 1=SCG). Used to identify the Cell Group to modify. In this version of the specification, values 2 and 3 are not used.

elementList.name: UL Configuration
elementList.description: Indicates whether the Cell Group is used for UL traffic.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of UP parameters (e.g., GTP
  tunnels) for a DRB. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: PDCP Count
descriptionList: This IE include the PDCP Count information.

elementList.name: PDCP SN
elementList.description: The PDCP SN Size is provided in the PDCP Configuration IE.

elementList.name: HFN
elementList.description: The PDCP SN Size is provided in the PDCP Configuration IE.

definitionList.name: NR CGI Support List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of supported NR
CGIs.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of supported NR CGIs. Value is 512. This range may be redefined.

definitionList.name: QoS Parameters Support List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the list of supported QoS
parameters.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of supported E-UTRAN QoS parameters. Value is 256. This range may be
  redefined.

Maximum no.
  of supported NG-RAN QoS parameters. Value is 256. This range may be
  redefined.

definitionList.name: PDCP Configuration
descriptionList: This IE carries the PDCP configuration.

elementList.name: PDCP SN UL Size
elementList.description: Indicates the PDCP SN UL size in bits. For more information see PDCP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10]. Is ignored if received through DRB To Modify List IE in the BEARER CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message.

elementList.name: PDCP SN DL Size
elementList.description: Indicates the PDCP SN DL size in bits. For more information see PDCP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10]. Is ignored if received through DRB To Modify List IE in the BEARER CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message.

elementList.name: RLC mode
elementList.description: Indicates the RLC mode for the DRB. For more information see PDCP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10]. Is ignored if received through DRB To Modify List IE in the BEARER CONTEXT MODIFICATION REQUEST message.

elementList.name: PDCP Duplication
elementList.description: Indicates whether PDCP duplication is to be configured for the DRB. This IE is ignored when the Additional PDCP duplication Information IE is present.

elementList.name: PDCP Re-establishment
elementList.description: Indicates PDCP entity re-establishment to be triggered as defined in TS 38.323 [17]

elementList.name: PDCP Data Recovery
elementList.description: Indicates PDCP data recovery to be triggered as defined in TS 38.323 [17]

elementList.name: Duplication Activation
elementList.description: Information on the initial state of DL PDCP duplication

elementList.name: Out Of Order Delivery
elementList.description: Indicates whether or not outOfOrderDelivery specified in TS 38.323 [17] is configured. Out of order delivery is configured only when the radio bearer is established.

elementList.name: PDCP Status Report Indication
elementList.description: For AM DRB, downlink indicates that the PDCP entity is configured to send PDCP status report(s) to the UE, and uplink indicates that the UE is configured to send PDCP status report(s), as specified in TS 38.323 [17]. both indicates that both downlink and uplink should be applied.

elementList.name: Additional PDCP duplication Information
elementList.description: Indicates the number of PDCP duplication configured when it is more than 2 for the DRB

definitionList.name: SDAP Configuration
descriptionList: This IE carries the SDAP configuration.

elementList.name: Default DRB
elementList.description: Indicates whether or not this is the default DRB for the PDU Session Resource. For more information see SDAP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10].

elementList.name: SDAP Header UL
elementList.description: Indicates whether or not a SDAP header is present for UL data on this DRB. For more information see SDAP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10].

elementList.name: SDAP Header DL
elementList.description: Indicates whether or not a SDAP header is present for DL data on this DRB. For more information see SDAP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10].

definitionList.name: ROHC Parameters
descriptionList:
This IE carries the ROCH parameters for
header compressions.

elementList.name: Choice ROHC Parameters
elementList.description: For more information see PDCP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10].

elementList.name: max CID
elementList.description: See description of maxCID inTS 38.331 [10]

elementList.name: ROHC Profiles
elementList.description: Bitmap with supported UE profiles, bit 0 (LSB 0) = profile0x0001, bit 1 = profile0x0002, bit 2 = profile0x0003, bit 3 = profile0x0004, bit 4 = profile0x0006, bit 5 = profile0x0101, bit 6 = profile0x0102, bit 7 = profile0x0103, bit 8 = profile0x0104. See description of supportedROHC-Profiles in PDCP-Parameters in TS 38.331 [10].

elementList.name: Continue ROHC
elementList.description: See description of drb-ContinueROHC inTS 38.331 [10]

elementList.name: max CID
elementList.description: See description of maxCID inTS 38.331 [10]

elementList.name: ROHC Profiles
elementList.description: Bitmap with supported UE profiles, bit 4 = profile0x0006. See description of supportedROHC-Profiles in PDCP-Parameters in TS 38.331 [10].

elementList.name: Continue ROHC
elementList.description: See description of drb-ContinueROHC inTS 38.331 [10]

definitionList.name: T-Reordering Timer
descriptionList: This IE indicates the t-Reordering timer.

elementList.name: T-Reordering Timer
elementList.description: Indicates the t-Reordering UL timer. The values are expressed in ms. For more information see PDCP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10].

definitionList.name: Discard Timer
descriptionList: This IE indicates PDCP discard timer.

elementList.name: Discard Timer
elementList.description: Indicates the PDCP discard timer. The values are expressed in ms. For more information see PDCP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10].

definitionList.name: UL Data Split Threshold
descriptionList: This IE indicates UL data split threshold.

elementList.name: UL Data Split Threshold
elementList.description: Indicates the UL data split threshold. The values are expressed in bytes. For more information see PDCP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10].

definitionList.name: Data Usage Report List
descriptionList:
This IE provides information on the data
usage for the UE, e.g., secondary NR RAT in EN-DC as
specified in TS 37.340 [19].

elementList.name: Start timestamp
elementList.description: Encoded in the same format as the first four octets of the 64-bit timestamp format as defined in section 6 of IETF RFC 5905 [14]. It indicates the UTC time when the recording of the Data Volume was started.

elementList.name: End timestamp
elementList.description: Encoded in the same format as the first four octets of the 64-bit timestamp format as defined in section 6 of IETF RFC 5905 [14]. It indicates the UTC time when the recording of the Data Volume was ended.

elementList.name: Usage count UL
elementList.description: The unit is: octets.

elementList.name: Usage count DL
elementList.description: The unit is: octets.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of DRBs. Value is 32.

Maximum no. of time reporting periods. Value is
  2.

definitionList.name: Flow Failed List
descriptionList:
This IE contains a list of QoS flows with a
cause value. It is used for example to indicate failed QoS flow(s) or QoS flow(s)
to be released.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of QoS flows in a PDU Session.
  Value is 64.

definitionList.name: Packet Loss Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Packet Loss Rate for a QoS
Flow.

elementList.name: Packet Loss Rate
elementList.description: Ratio of lost packets per number of packets sent, expressed in tenth of percent.

definitionList.name: Packet Delay Budget
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Packet Delay Budget
for a QoS Flow.

elementList.name: Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Upper bound value for the delay that a packet may experience expressed in unit of 0.5ms.

definitionList.name: Packet Error Rate
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Packet Error Rate for
a QoS Flow.

elementList.name: Scalar
elementList.description: The packet error rate is expressed as Scalar x 10-k where k is the Exponent.

definitionList.name: Averaging Window
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Averaging Window for
a QoS Flow.

elementList.name: Averaging Window
elementList.description: Unit: ms. The default value is 2000ms.

definitionList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Maximum Data Burst
Volume for a QoS Flow and applies to delay critical GBR
QoS flows only.

elementList.name: Maximum Data Burst Volume
elementList.description: Unit: byte.

definitionList.name: Priority Level
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Priority Level for a
QoS Flow.

elementList.name: Priority Level
elementList.description: Values ordered in decreasing order of priority i.e. with 1 as the highest priority and 127 as the lowest priority.

definitionList.name: Security Result
descriptionList:
This IE indicates whether the security
policy indicated as "preferred" in the Security Indication IE
is performed or not.

elementList.name: Integrity Protection Result
elementList.description: Indicates whether UP integrity protection is performed or not for the concerned PDU Session Resource.

elementList.name: Confidentiality Protection Result
elementList.description: Indicates whether UP ciphering is performed or not for the concerned PDU Session Resource.

definitionList.name: Transaction ID
descriptionList:
The Transaction ID IE uniquely
identifies a procedure among all ongoing parallel procedures of the same type
initiated by the same protocol peer. Messages belonging to the same procedure
shall use the same Transaction ID. The Transaction ID is determined by the
initiating peer of a procedure.

definitionList.name: Inactivity timer
descriptionList: This IE indicates the inactivity timer.

elementList.name: Inactivity Timer
elementList.description: Indicates the inactivity timer. The values are expressed in seconds.

definitionList.name: Paging Priority Indicator (PPI)
descriptionList:
The Paging Policy Indicator is used for
paging policy differentiation (see details in TS 23.501 [20]).

definitionList.name: gNB-CU-UP Capacity
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the relative processing
capacity of an gNB-CU-UP with respect to other gNB-CU-UPs in order to
load-balance among different gNB-CU-UPs.

definitionList.name: Maximum Integrity Protected Data Rate
descriptionList:
This IE
indicates the maximum aggregate data rate for integrity protected DRBs for a UE
as defined in TS 38.300 [8].

elementList.name: Maximum IP rate
elementList.description: Defines the upper bound of the aggregated data rate of user plane integrity protected data. This limit applies to both UL and DL independently.

definitionList.name: PDCP SN Status Information
descriptionList: This IE contains information about PDCP PDU transfer status of a DRB.

elementList.name: Receive Status Of PDCP SDU
elementList.description: The first bit indicates the status of the SDU after the First Missing UL PDCP SDU. The Nth bit indicates the status of the UL PDCP SDU in position (N + First Missing SDU Number) modulo (1 + the maximum value of the PDCP-SN). 0: PDCP SDU has not been received. 1: PDCP SDU has been received correctly.

elementList.name: UL COUNT Value
elementList.description: PDCP-SN and Hyper Frame Number of the first missing UL SDU

elementList.name: DL COUNT Value
elementList.description: PDCP-SN and Hyper Frame Number that the target NG-RAN node (handover) or the NG-RAN node to which the DRB context is transferred (dual connectivity) should assign for the next DL SDU not having an SN yet.

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Mapping List
descriptionList:
This IE contains a list of DRBs containing
information about the mapped QoS flows.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of QoS
  flows allowed within one PDU Session.
  Value is 64.

definitionList.name: QoS Flow Mapping Indication
descriptionList:
This IE is used to indicate whether only the uplink or only the downlink of a QoS flow is
mapped to a DRB.

elementList.name: QoS Flow Mapping Indication
elementList.description: Indicates that only the uplink or downlink QoS flow is mapped to the DRB

definitionList.name: PDCP SN Size
descriptionList: This IE carries the PDCP SN Size.

elementList.name: PDCP SN Size
elementList.description: Indicates the PDCP SN size in bits. For more information see PDCP-Config IE in TS 38.331 [10].

definitionList.name: Network Instance
descriptionList:
This IE provides the network instance to be
used by the NG-RAN node when selecting a particular transport network resource
as described in TS 23.501 [20].

definitionList.name: MR-DC Usage Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides information on the data
usage for the UE connected to 5GC, e.g., secondary RAT in MR-DC as specified in TS 37.340 [19].

elementList.name: Data Usage per PDU Session Report
Data Usage per QoS Flow List
Data Usage per QoS Flow Item

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of QoS flows allowed within one
  PDU session. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: MR-DC Data Usage Report List
descriptionList:
This IE provides information
on the data usage.

elementList.name: Start timestamp
elementList.description: UTC time encoded in the same format as the first four octets of the 64-bit timestamp format as defined in section 6 of IETF RFC 5905 [14]. It indicates the start time of the collecting period of the included Usage Count UL IE and Usage Count DL IE.

elementList.name: End timestamp
elementList.description: UTC time encoded in the same format as the first four octets of the 64-bit timestamp format as defined in section 6 of IETF RFC 5905 [14]. It indicates the end time of the collecting period of the included Usage Count UL IE and Usage Count DL IE.

elementList.name: Usage count UL
elementList.description: The unit is: octets.

elementList.name: Usage count DL
elementList.description: The unit is: octets.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of time reporting periods. Value is
  2.

definitionList.name: gNB-DU ID
descriptionList: The gNB-DU ID uniquely identifies a gNB-DU at least within a gNB-CU.

elementList.name: gNB-DU ID
elementList.description: The gNB-DU ID is independently configured from cell identifiers, i.e. no connection between gNB-DU ID and cell identifiers.

definitionList.name: Common Network Instance
descriptionList:
This IE provides the common network
instance to be used by the NG-RAN node when selecting a particular transport
network resource as described in TS 23.501 [9] in a format common with 5GC.

definitionList.name: Activity Notification Level
descriptionList:
This IE contains information on which level
activity notification shall be performed..

definitionList.name: Trace Activation
descriptionList:
This IE defines parameters related to a
trace session activation.

elementList.name: Trace ID
elementList.description: This IE is composed of the following: Trace Reference defined in TS 32.422 [24] (leftmost 6 octets, with PLMN information encoded as in 9.3.1.7), and Trace Recording Session Reference defined in TS 32.422 [24] (last 2 octets).

elementList.name: Interfaces To Trace
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap represents an NG-RAN node interface: first bit = NG-C, second bit = Xn-C, third bit = Uu, fourth bit = F1-C, fifth bit = E1: other bits reserved for future use. Value '1' indicates 'should be traced'. Value '0' indicates 'should not be traced'.

elementList.name: Trace Depth
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (minimum, medium, maximum, minimumWithoutVendorSpecificExtension, mediumWithoutVendorSpecificExtension, maximumWithoutVendorSpecificExtension, )
elementList.description: Defined in TS 32.422 [24].

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity IP Address
elementList.description: For File based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [24]. Should be ignored if URI is present.

elementList.name: Trace Collection Entity URI
elementList.description: For Streaming based Reporting. Defined in TS 32.422 [24] Replaces Trace Collection Entity IP Address if present.

definitionList.name: Subscriber Profile ID for RAT/Frequency priority
descriptionList:
This parameter is used to define local
configuration for RRM strategies.

elementList.name: Subscriber Profile ID for RAT/Frequency priority

definitionList.name: Additional RRM Policy Index
descriptionList:
The Additional
RRM Policy Index IE is used to provide additional information as specified
in TS 36.300 [25].

definitionList.name: Retainability Measurements Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains information on removed
DRB(s) and QoS Flow(s) which are needed to perform retainability measurements.

elementList.name: DRB Released In Session
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (released in session, not released in session, )
elementList.description: Indicates if the DRB was in session or not (as defined in TS 32.425 [26] and TS 28.552 [22]) when released

elementList.name: DRB Accumulated Session Time
elementList.description: Accumulated in session time for the DRB, as defined in TS 32.425 [26] and TS 28.552 [22], in milliseconds

elementList.name: QoS Flow Released In Session
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (released in session, not released in session, )
elementList.description: Indicates if the QoS Flow was in session or not (as defined in TS 28.552 [22]), when released

elementList.name: QoS Flow Accumulated Session Time
elementList.description: Accumulated in session time for the QoS Flow, as defined in TS 28.552 [22], in milliseconds

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no.
  of DRBs for a UE. Value is 32.

Maximum no.
  of QoS flows in a PDU Session. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: TNL Available Capacity Indicator
descriptionList:
The TNL Available Capacity Indicator
IE indicates offered and available capacity of the
Transport Network.

elementList.name: DL TNL Offered Capacity
elementList.description: Maximum capacity in kbps

elementList.name: DL TNL Available Capacity
elementList.description: Available capacity. Value 100 corresponds to the offered capacity.

elementList.name: UL TNL Offered Capacity
elementList.description: Maximum capacity in kbps

elementList.name: UL TNL Available Capacity
elementList.description: Available capacity. Value 100 corresponds to the offered capacity.

definitionList.name: HW Capacity Indicator
descriptionList:
The HW Capacity Indicator IE
indicates offered and available throughput experienced by the gNB-CU-UP.

elementList.name: Offered Throughput
elementList.description: Maximum capacity offered by the gNB-CU-UP in kbps

elementList.name: Available Throughput
elementList.description: Average available capacity at the gNB-CU-UP. Value 100 corresponds to the offered throughput.

definitionList.name: Redundant QoS Flow Indicator
descriptionList: This IE provides the Redundant QoS Flow Indicator for a QoS flow as specified in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Redundant QoS Flow Indicator
elementList.description: This IE indicates that this QoS flow is requested for the redundant transmission. Value true indicates that redundant transmission is requested for this QoS flow. Value false indicates that redundant transmission is requested to be stopped if started.

definitionList.name: TSC Traffic Characteristics
descriptionList:
This IE provides the traffic
characteristics of TSC QoS flows.

definitionList.name: TSC Assistance Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides the TSC assistance
information for a TSC QoS flow in the uplink or downlink (see TS 23.501 [20]).

definitionList.name: Periodicity
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Periodicity of the
TSC QoS flow as defined in TS 23.501 [20].

elementList.name: Periodicity
elementList.description: Periodicity expressed in units of 1 us.

definitionList.name: Burst Arrival Time
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the Burst Arrival Time of
the TSC QoS flow as defined in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: Burst Arrival Time
elementList.description: Encoded in the same format as the ReferenceTime IE as defined in TS 38.331 [10]. The value is truncated to 1 us granularity.

definitionList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
descriptionList: This IE indicates the Packet Delay Budget for a QoS flow.

elementList.name: Extended Packet Delay Budget
elementList.description: Upper bound value for the delay that a packet may experience expressed in unit of 0.01ms.

definitionList.name: Redundant PDU Session Information
descriptionList:
This IE defines
Redundancy information to be
applied to a PDU Session.

definitionList.name: QoS Mapping Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the DSCP and/or IPv6 Flow
Label field(s) of IP packet which is sent through the GTP-U tunnel of a
requested DRB. This IE is only used for IAB.

definitionList.name: NID
descriptionList:
This IE contains the Network Identifier of
an SNPN, as specified in TS 23.501 [20]. The NID is specified in TS 23.003 [23].

definitionList.name: NPN Support Information
descriptionList: This IE provides NPN related information.

elementList.name: NID
elementList.description: This IE is associated with the PLMN Identity and the Slice Support List contained in the Supported PLMNs IE. Together with the PLMN Identity it identifies the SNPN supported by the gNB-CU-UP.

definitionList.name: NPN Context Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides bearer context related NPN
information.

elementList.name: NID
elementList.description: This IE is associated with Serving PLMN information contained in bearer context related E1AP message. Together with the Serving PLMN identity it identifies the serving SNPN.

definitionList.name: MDT Configuration
descriptionList:
The IE defines the NR
MDT configuration parameters.

elementList.name: MDT Activation
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (Immediate MDT only, Immediate MDT and Trace, )

elementList.name: Measurements to Activate
elementList.description: Each position in the bitmap indicates a MDT measurement, as defined in TS 37.320 [27]. Fourth Bit = M4, Seventh Bit = M6, Eighth Bit = M7. Value 1 indicates activate and value 0 indicates do not activate . This version of the specification does not use bits 1, bit 2, bit 3, bit 5 and bit 6.

conditionList.explanation:
This IE shall be present if the Measurements
  to Activate IE has the fourth bit set to  1 .

This IE shall be present if the Measurements to
  Activate IE has the seventh bit set to  1 .

This IE shall be present if the Measurements to
  Activate IE has the eighth bit set to  1 .

definitionList.name: M4 Configuration
descriptionList:
This IE defines the parameters for M4
measurement collection.

definitionList.name: M6 Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for M6 measurement collection.

elementList.name: M6 Report Interval
elementList.type: ENUMERATED (ms120, ms240, ms480, ms640,ms1024, ms2048, ms5120, ms10240, ms20480, ms40960, min1,min6, min12, min30, )

definitionList.name: M7 Configuration
descriptionList: This IE defines the parameters for M7 measurement collection.

definitionList.name: MDT PLMN List
descriptionList:
The purpose of the MDT PLMN List IE
is to provide the list of PLMN allowed for MDT.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of PLMNs in the MDT PLMN list.
  Value is 16.

definitionList.name: EHC Parameters
descriptionList:
This IE carries the EHC parameters for ethernet
header compression.

elementList.name: EHC-CID-Length
elementList.description: See description of ehc-CID-Length in TS 38.331 [10]

elementList.name: drb-ContinueEHC-DL
elementList.description: See description of drb-ContinueEHC-DL in TS 38.331 [10]

elementList.name: drb-ContinueEHC-UL
elementList.description: See description of drb-ContinueEHC-UL in TS 38.331 [10]

definitionList.name: DAPS Request Information
descriptionList:
The DAPS Indicator IE indicates that
DAPS HO is requested for the concerned DRB.

elementList.name: DAPS Indicator
elementList.description: Indicates that DAPS HO is requested

definitionList.name: Early Forwarding COUNT Information
descriptionList:
This IE contains DL COUNT value related to
early data forwarding during DAPS Handover or Conditional Handover or conditional PSCell change.

elementList.name: FIRST DL COUNT Value
elementList.description: PDCP-SN and Hyper frame number of the first DL SDU that the source NG-RAN node forwards to the target NG-RAN node

elementList.name: DISCARD DL COUNT Value
elementList.description: PDCP-SN and Hyper frame number for which the target NG-RAN node should discard forwarded DL SDUs associated with lower values.

definitionList.name: Alternative QoS Parameters Set List
descriptionList:
This IE contains alternative sets of QoS
parameters which the NG-RAN node can indicate to be fulfilled when notification
control is enabled and it cannot fulfil the requested list of QoS parameters.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of alternative sets of QoS
  Parameters allowed for the QoS under Notification Control. Value is 8.

definitionList.name: Extended Slice Support List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates a list of supported
slices.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of signalled slice support items.
  Value is 65535.

definitionList.name: Extended gNB-CU-CP Name
descriptionList:
This IE provides extended human readable
name of the gNB-CU-CP.

definitionList.name: Extended gNB-CU-UP Name
descriptionList:
This IE provides extended human readable
name of the gNB-CU-UP.

definitionList.name: UP Transport Layer Information
descriptionList:
The UP Transport Layer Information IE
identifies an transport bearer associated to a DRB. It contains a Transport
Layer Address and a GTP Tunnel Endpoint Identifier. The Transport Layer Address
is an IP address to be used for the user plane transport.

definitionList.name: CP Transport Layer Information
descriptionList:
This IE is used to provide the E1 control
plane transport layer information associated with an gNB-CU-CP and gNB-CU-UP
pair.

definitionList.name: GTP-TEID
descriptionList:
The GTP-TEID IE is the GTP Tunnel
Endpoint Identifier to be used for the user plane transport.

elementList.name: GTP-TEID
elementList.description: For details and range, see TS 29.281 [15].

definitionList.name: Transport Layer Address
descriptionList:
This Transport Layer Address IE is
an IP address.

elementList.name: Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: The Radio Network Layer is not supposed to interpret the address information. It should pass it to the Transport Layer for interpretation. For details, see TS 38.414 [16].

definitionList.name: Data Forwarding Information Request
descriptionList:
This IE
offers the possibility for the gNB-CU-CP to request data forwarding addresses
to the gNB-CU-UP. It also offers the possibility for the gNB-CU-CP to provide a
list of QoS flows subject to PDU Session level or DRB level data forwarding to
the gNB to which DRBs or QoS flows have been offloaded.

elementList.name: QoS Flows forwarded on the forwarding tunnel(s)
elementList.description: This IE contains information for which QoS flows forwarded data packets are sent on: - either the PDU Session forwarding tunnel (UL and DL) - or the DRB forwarding tunnel (UL and DL).

definitionList.name: Data Forwarding Information
descriptionList:
This IE provides
the data forwarding information when performing
handover or data offloading.

definitionList.name: Transport Network Layer Address Info
descriptionList:
This IE is used for signalling TNL address
information.

elementList.name: Transport UP Layer Addresses Info to Add List
Transport UP Layer Addresses Info to Add Item
IPsec Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Network Layer address for IPsec endpoint.

elementList.name: GTP Transport Layer Addresses To Add List
GTP Transport Layer Addresses To Add Item
GTP Transport Layer Address Info
elementList.description: GTP Transport Layer Addresses for GTP end-points.

elementList.name: Transport UP Layer Addresses Info to Remove List
Transport UP Layer Addresses Info to Remove Item
IPsec Transport Layer Address
elementList.description: Transport Network Layer address for IPsec endpoint.

elementList.name: GTP Transport Layer Addresses To Remove List
GTP Transport Layer Addresses To Remove Item
GTP Transport Layer Address Info
elementList.description: GTP Transport Layer Addresses for GTP end-points.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of Transport Layer Addresses in the
  message. Value is 16.

Maximum no. of GTP Transport Layer Addresses
  for a GTP end-point in the message. Value is 16.

definitionList.name: URI
descriptionList:
This IE is defined to contain a URI 
address.

elementList.name: URI
elementList.description: String representing URI (Uniform Resource Identifier)

Data Forwarding Information Request
elementList.description: Requesting forwarding info from the target gNB-CU-UP.

elementList.name: DRB Inactivity Timer
elementList.description: Included if the Activity Notification Level is set to DRB.

elementList.name: Existing Allocated S1 DL UP Transport Layer Information
elementList.description: This IE is not used in this version of the specification.

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of DRBs for a UE. Value is 32.

definitionList.name: PDU Session Resource To Setup List

This IE contains PDU session resource
related information used at Bearer Context Setup Request

elementList.name: PDU Session Resource To Setup Item
PDU Session Resource DL Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate
elementList.description: This IE shall be present when at least one Non-GBR QoS Flows is being setup.

elementList.name: NG UL UP Transport Layer Information
PDU Session Data Forwarding Information Request
PDU Session Inactivity Timer
elementList.description: Included if the Activity Notification Level is set to PDU Session.

elementList.name: Existing Allocated NG DL UP Transport Layer Information
Network Instance
elementList.description: This IE is ignored if the Common Network Instance IE is included.

elementList.name: QoS Flows Information To Be Setup
DRB Data forwarding information Request
elementList.description: Requesting forwarding info from the target gNB-CU-UP.

elementList.name: DRB Inactivity Timer
elementList.description: Included if the Activity Notification Level is set to DRB.

elementList.name: PDCP SN Status Information
elementList.description: Contains the PDCP SN Status at setup after Resume.

elementList.name: DRB QoS
elementList.description: Indicates the DRB QoS when more than one QoS Flow is mapped to the DRB.

elementList.name: Redundant NG UL UP Transport Layer Information

rangeBoundList.explanation: Maximum no. of DRBs for a UE. Value is 32.

Maximum no. of PDU Sessions for a UE. Value is
  256.

This IE contains setup DRB related

Data Forwarding Information Response

elementList.description: This IE is not used in this version of the specification.

elementList.name: S1 UL UP Transport Layer Information

elementList.name: Flow Mapping Information

elementList.name: DRB Inactivity Timer

  256.
